description.@en: If at first I don’t succeed, I’ll try, try again.

system.notes:
Lawbreaker Trait

Professions of this Archetype are typically oath breakers or on the run from something or someone. They deal in lies, steal from the unwary and rabble-rouse to earn their keep, and with nothing to lose, they have little to fear.

effect.@en: Whenever you spend a Coin to re-roll a Skill Test and fail, re-roll a final time (but you must accept the results of this final roll).
